text: Decent. The noodles were over cooked in seafood Cantonese felt it was a bit bland. My favorite dish was beef and vegetables.
The prices were good for the portions it came with. Ordered online via skipthedishes. The descriptions were not all that helpful though, so didn't get exactly what I wanted.

Impressed; although they're in the SW part of the city and a 30-min drive to DT, they can deliver, and their very own drivers too...some Calgary restos will use a courier service.  Delivery charge a reasonable $6.50.  Staff are well fluent in English too.
